From: p********1@outlook.com

SUBJECT: Re:    Attn Carrie
I write to let you know that your payment has been approved and ready to be released but your file needs to be validated and this requires a $50 payment file re-validation fee.
       I have made contact with the director foreign remittance, John Kelvin and he said that you have only 3 payment options to receive the fund.
The 3 options are;
1.   Bank to Bank transfer .......
2.   Consignment Box/Cash delivery by courier.  It just requires only clearance in the port of entry at your airport but the cost is not confirmed yet.
3.    ATM Visa card which must be activated for international use, in any ATM facility in your country and it shall be delivered to your address in 3 business days/72hrs delivery period.
   Meanwhile, before any further process shall be established on your $2.8 Million, the payment file has to be re-validated due to the over delayed payment process and the re-validation fee is just $50 dollars.
So, I encourage you to send the $50 payment file re-validation fee today.
SEND THE $50 THROUGH WESTERN UNION, MONEY GRAM, RIA MONEY;
First Receiver Name::::: NAMPEERA
Middle name::::::: LYDIA
Last name::::::::::: GIFT
Address:::::Apollo Houseplot 17 B, William St, Kampala, Uganda
Waiting to read from you today.
Philip G Shelton, S.A.
Shelton Law & Associates Chambers.
Address: BMK House, 4th Floor, Suite No.402 Plot 4-5 Nyabong Road, Wampewo Ave, Kampala, Uganda.
